nav.div: School District of Washington » About Us » Coronavirus COVID-19 » Grab-And-Go Meals

span.a: Register By Clicking Here to Complete the Grab-And-Go Meals Survey

strong.span: School District of Washington Offers Grab-And-Go Meals

br.br:
For those who have registered, the School District of Washington will offer free meals to children in the District ages 0-18 on weekdays starting Tuesday, March 24. We understand how difficult this time is for many families, and we don’t want anyone to worry about where they will get their next meal. The following information will explain how the program will work:
● Starting Tuesday, March 24, Grab and Go meal service will be offered at Washington West Elementary and Marthasville Elementary from 7:00 a.m. - 9:00 a.m and 5:00 p.m. - 7:00 p.m.
● Families will pick up twice per week, Tuesday and Friday at one of the times above.
● Tuesday pick up/delivery will include Wednesday - Friday breakfast and lunch, and Friday pick-up will include Monday - Tuesday breakfast and lunch.
● This program through the USDA allows us to provide breakfast and lunch for weekdays only.
● Students or children ages 0-18 must be present at the time of pick-up or upon delivery.
● Delivery service will occur each Tuesday and Friday between 7:00 a.m. - 9:00 a.m. Evening delivery will not be offered.
● An SDOW employee or volunteer will step off the bus to deliver the meals to your home, children can wave from inside the house, but must be present at time of delivery. Delivery will occur between 7:00 - 9:00 a.m. on Tuesday and Friday. Please look for the bus and be prepared upon arrival.
● SDOW employees/volunteers will be at Washington West and Marthasville Elementary pick up locations providing curb-side grab and go.
● If you have a question or transportation issues and can’t arrange for pick up at one of the locations mentioned above, please call 636-262-2926.

div.strong: ​Register By Clicking Here to Complete the Grab-And-Go Meals Survey

div.div:
The School District of Washington is planning for a Grab and Go meal service for students ages 18 and under beginning next week. Our Food Service Department will be providing these meals, both breakfast and lunch during the closure.
In order for us to properly plan, we first need to assess the need in our community. We will be offering pick up points at Washington West Elementary and Marthasville Elementary. We may also offer delivery services for families that do not have transportation to the pickup points on both sides of the river.
If you are interested in this service and feel it would be a good option for your children, please complete the google form to indicate your preferences.
The google form will be emailed to you this evening and is also located on our district website. It should be completed by the end of the day tomorrow, Thursday, March 19, at 4:00 p.m.
For those without the internet, you may call 636-262-2926 to participate. Please note that your children must be present at the time of curb-side pick up as well as upon delivery.

220 Locust Street, Washington, MO 63090
Phone 636-231-2000 | Fax 636-239-3315
